Rule.Name: f2013MSI
Rule.Query: $n4DigitSKUVersion='2013' and $.='MSI'

Rule.Name: sThirdPartyFaultModule
Rule.Title: Skype for Business crash due to third-party module: {0} on: {2}
Rule.Text:
To resolve this issue, make sure Skype for Business is up-to-date. If the problem continues, update the software related to this dll file.
For reference, the third-party vendor is: {1}.

Rule.Name: sMicrosoftFaultModule
Rule.Title: Skype for Business crash due to module: {0} on: {2}
Rule.Text:
To resolve this issue, make sure Skype for Business is up-to-date. If the problem continues, make sure you are using the latest video and audio drivers for your hardware.
Click the 'Click here ...' link for information on updating drivers.

Rule.Name: n3511980Crash107460756537
Rule.Query: count(../Instance[Setting[@Key1='Fault offset' and (lower-case(Value)='001dba3b')] and Setting[@Key1='Faulting Module Name' and (lower-case(Value)='uc.dll')]])

Rule.Name: sSkype15Crash3511980MSI
Rule.Query: $nInstallType='MSI' and $n2DigitVersion=15 and versioncompare($sFullAppVersion,'15.0.4745.1000')<=0 and ($n3511980Crash107460756537>0 or $n3511980Crash107517044785>0 or $n3511980Crash120281007626>0 or $n3511980Crash120296601017>0)
Rule.Title: Known crashing issue in Skype for Business
Rule.Text:
A known crashing issue with Skype for Business that occurs when you change networks (for example, ethernet to wireless) has been detected {0} time(s). It is fixed in the Sept 8, 2015 update for Skype for Business.
Please click the 'Click here ...' link for details on the Sept 8, 2015 update. Or, click the 'Download the update ...' link to access the very latest update for Skype for Business.

Rule.Name: sEmetMitigationSkype
